questions.name: Would you interrupt?
rows: Your friend is giving tourists directions and you realise the directions aren't correct.
Your teacher is telling the class about the homework assignment and you are confused about part of it.
Your friend is telling a funny story and you realised they missed something out.
A friend of your family is telling you about something in the news, but you already know about it.
Your teacher is telling off one of the students in your class for breaking something, but you know he didn't do it.
You are arguing with a friend about where to go at the weekend.
Your friend is accusing you of saying something, but you didn't say it.
Your teacher is giving you a very detailed explanation about how to do something really simple.
